name: 0nnnALT

body.origin:
|- wn(wcel(nat0, cn))
-| wbr(nat0, clt, nat1)
-| wi(wcel(nat0, cn), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, nat1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wn(wcel(nat0, cn))
-| wbr(nat0, clt, nat1)
-| wi(wcel(nat0, cn), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, nat1)))

|- wn(wcel(nat0, cn))
-| wi(wcel(nat0, cn), wn(wbr(nat0, clt, nat1)))

comment: Alternate proof of ~ 0nnn , which requires ~ ax-pre-mulgt0 but is not based on ~ nnne0 (and which can therefore be used in ~ nnne0ALT ). (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-1999.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
